attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All too often these days, juveniles who commit crime(s) that would result in an adult being named locally, and having to face the full extent of the Law,  are shielded from public scrutiny because of some archaic law.
It is time that youngsters who commit adult class crime are at least "Named and Shamed", although I believe they should go through the System, and age or sex should not be a mitigating factor.
If they are very young, then Child Benefit should be withheld, and parents made, at least in part, for the behaviour of their offspring.
